extendedInfo.description: Missed call and SMS/MMS reminder with profiles.The application notify you of missed calls and unread SMS/MMS.Useful on phones without an LED indicator.Features:â Support profiles.â Remind by: sound, vibration, turning screen on, camera flash (not all devices are supported).â Remind about: missed call, missed sms and mms messages.â Contact filter. Allow to start notification only for defined contacts. (only in Premium version).â Night mode.â Customizable notification schedule: order of notifications, repeat interval and repeats count.â You can set different reminders for missed calls and messages.â Option to disable sound when you set your phone in silent mode.â Option to ignore accidental (short) calls.â Does not disturb during a call.â Widgets.â Without advertising.â No unneeded Permissions.â Compact size.â Low memory consumption.â And more ...Languages supported:* English* Ð ÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹* FranÃ§ais (thanks lduflot70)* ä¸­æ - ç®ä½* ä¸­æ - ç¹é«* ÄeÅ¡tina* Italiano* Ð¡ÑÐ¿ÑÐºÐ¸ ÑÐµÐ·Ð¸Ðº* You can add/fix translation here http://goo.gl/W0QHvFrequently Asked Questions (FAQ): (Full list here http://goo.gl/vA8z8)Q) How to make different notifications for missed calls and missed messages?A)- Duplicate profile (long tap on the desired profile - click the 'Duplicate'),- In one profile set remind only about Calls,- In copy - set remind only about Messages,- Adjust these two profiles as you wish.Support forum: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=38143514IF YOU FIND A BUG OR OTHER ISSUE, PLEASE DO NOT HURRY TO GIVE LOW RATE, PLEASE EMAIL ME AND I WILL TRY TO FIX IT.Keywords: missed call, missed message, miss call alert, miss call reminder, sms reminder, notification, profile, flash notify, flash alerts

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Now with this app, you can be reminded with missing calls and sms even if you don\'t have LED light in your mobile.
reviews.author: Ali Hajjar

reviews.title: The real deal
reviews.comment: This app does exactly as described. The developer built in the flexibility to bug but not annoy, a difficult balance. And, so far, appears ad free. Big kudos to programmers.
reviews.author: Kelvin Andrews

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: My Note 2 has a SMS/MMS reminder, but only uses the same sound as set for the SMS/MMS and no reminder for missed calls.  I wanted to have a call reminder and be able to set different sounds for calls and SMS and this app works perfectly.
reviews.author: Kurt Braun

reviews.title: Light and adjustable
reviews.comment: Best reminder on playstore
reviews.author: Herkulus G

reviews.title: Removing - slows phone dialing horribly
reviews.comment: It took me a while to figure out that this app was causing a huge delay when dialing a number or using a speedial.  We\'re talking about a minute or so.  I tried everything to fix this and just thought one night about this app.  After I disabled, I have had no problems.  I am going to remove it all together.  I am using a Verizon HTC Rezound.
reviews.author: David Slater

reviews.title: Doesnt work on missed calls
reviews.comment: Only seems to work with emails
reviews.author: Chris Sutch

reviews.comment: Works excellently! Just what I\'ve been looking for.

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Tried three different aps like this and none would work on my brand phone. This one does everything it\'s supposed to do on my LG Nitro.
reviews.author: Gerald Belzer

reviews.title: Good but some improvements are required
reviews.comment: Please giv the option to use the touch sensitive buttons light for notifications instead of just flashlight.  I have galaxy note and it doesn\'t have a led notification indicator.!

reviews.title: Awesome
